summary: Refusing to let himself be re-settled on a Florida reservation, Massai, an Apache warrior, escapes his captors and returns to his homeland to become a peaceful farmer.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Jean Peters|John McIntire|Charles Bronson|John Dehner|Paul Guilfoyle|Ian MacDonald|Walter Sande|Morris Ankrum|Monte Blue|Paul E. Burns|Lonnie Burr|John George|Ann Kunde|Rory Mallinson|Mort Mills|Dick Rich|Steve Rowland|Tony Urchel|Philip Van Zandt|William Wilkerson
title: Apache
